headline: QuantumScape (QS), GM (GM) Climb on Strong EV Data
summary: EV battery maker QuantumScape (QS) and General Motors (GM) are advancing 11% and 4%, respectively, after a research firm estimated on Friday that U.S. EV sales had surged 12% last quarter versus the same period a year earlier. Meanwhile, GM noted on Friday that its EV sales had climbed roughly 100% in Q4 versus Q2. […]

headline: General Motors' Q4 US Sales Rise 21% Y/Y on Robust EV Deliveries
summary: GM's fourth-quarter U.S. sales rise 21% year over year on the back of strong EV sales, which increase 50% year over year to 43,982 units.
